DOC.brief_summary: This is an open label, single use, randomized, 4-period cross-over study. In each period, subjects will receive one of 4 test combinations. Blood will be drawn prior to study product consumption and following study product consumption for glucose measures.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Effects of Psyllium on Blood Glucose
DOC.criteria: male 18 to 50 years of age general good health Body Mass Index (BMI) in the range of 18.529.9 kg/m2 fasting plasma blood glucose <126mg/dL not actively treated for high blood glucose willing and able to have blood drawn at multiple times during each 4 visits history of allergy or hypersensitivity to inhaled or ingested psyllium or meal ingredients Phenylketonuria (PKU) an eating disorder following special medical or weightloss dietary restrictions taking dietary supplements or prescription medication for the purpose of weight loss/management
